remarks: Domain of general operation on positive reals.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
genp.1 $e |- F = ( w e. P. , v e. P. |-> { x | E. y e. w E. z e. v x = ( y G z ) } ) $.
genp.2 $e |- ( ( y e. Q. /\ z e. Q. ) -> ( y G z ) e. Q. ) $.
genpdm $p |- dom F = ( P. X. P. ) $.
$d G v w x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
